title: Jeremy Corbyn – 2022 Comments on Austerity
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Jeremy Corbyn, the Independent MP for North Islington, on Twitter on 23 October 2022.
content:
A “tough choice” is deciding whether to feed your children or heat your home.
